Caption: The audience stands as Dr. A.L. Mudaliar escorts Sir C.V. Raman to the dais
Description: The convocation took place on a Saturday evening at the Institute’s Open Air Theatre. The chief guest and speaker at this event was Sir C. V. Raman, the Indian physicist, Nobel laureate and Bharat Ratna recipient.  Dr. A. L. Mudaliar (Padma Bhushan, Padma Vibhushan), the chairman of the Board of Governors, presided over the ceremony. After being presented a Guard of Honour by the cadets of the N.C.C, Sir C. V. Raman was received by Dr. A. L. Mudaliar, who introduced him to all the members of the council and senate members who were present at the occasion before proceeding to don the academic robes for the ceremony. A group photo of all the graduates and dignitaries was taken. The dignitaries then proceeded to the convocation venue in a procession of two’s.
